episode.title: A Clear Eyed Look at Dishwashers
episode.rawTitle: 260: ‘A Clear Eyed Look at Dishwashers’ With John Siracusa
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest John Siracusa finally returns to the show. Topics include the Siri voice recording fiasco, Siracusa’s epic Mac OS X reviews, and making good ice.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest John Siracusa finally returns to the show. Topics include the Siri voice recording fiasco, Siracusa’s epic Mac OS X reviews, and making good ice.
